review: "Game of Thrones - Das Lied von Eis und Feuer" is a compelling graphic novel that captures the essence of George R. R. Martin's epic fantasy. The detailed and well-crafted illustrations bring the world of Westeros to life, and the adaptation stays true to the source material, with well-developed characters and engaging storytelling. The use of color to represent different character perspectives is a clever and helpful touch. While the high price and the fact that it only covers a portion of the first book are drawbacks, the overall experience is highly enjoyable and recommended for both fans and newcomers to the series.
